name: Unimpressive Sliding Box Game
description:
I think this is everything needed to play the game...

This is a simple "Look mom! I made* a game!" game. 3 levels, sliding boxes, fart noises. It's small, simple, and not a great game by any means, but it's the game that I made, and is the official start of my game dev journey.

*Made as in I followed a Brackeys tutorial series
